preparations.content: Place parsnips and apples in mixing bowl then chop <b>4 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add water and milk then cook <b>15 min/100°C/speed 2<b>. Purée <b>30 sec/speed 5<b> <b>-8 increasing speed gradually<b>. Scrape down sides and lid of mixing bowl with spatula then purée again <b>30 sec/speed 5<b> <b>-8 increasing speed gradually<b>. Allow to cool before serving or freeze in individual portions.
